mapper.select: select mno as no, name, tel, email from memb order by name asc limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
select mno as no, name, tel, email from memb where email=#{email} and pwd=password(#{password})
mapper.update: update memb set name=#{name}, tel=#{tel}, email=#{email}, pwd=password(#{password}) where mno=#{no}
